Current of Thought Must Be Changed.--The minds of many take so low a level that God cannot work for them or with them. The current of thought must be 


                                                787 

changed, the moral sensibilities must be aroused to feel the claims of God. The sum and substance of true religion is to own and continually acknowledge--by words, by dress, by deportment--our relationship to God. Humility should take the place of pride; sobriety, of levity; and devotion, of irreligion and careless indifference.--4T 582 (1881).
